About

Tryouts is just a name under which I make Android apps. Since I'm a beginner they are not too complex. However I do hope that Tryouts apps are – and will continue to be in the future – fun and entertaining!

Download and test apps yourself! I would love to know your opinion. Contact form is just below. If that is just too much of a commitement, you can always leave your opinion on Google Play. Thanks!

Tryouts on Google Play

Around the Web

Bio

Hi! Michael here. Couple of months ago I decided to learn how to code. I also started a blog on this subject: From Grad School to Coding.

Copyright © MW 2017

Project 1

SudokuPlus is a free Android game for handheld devices. It comes with a pleasant UI, save/load mechanics and hinting system. There are two color schemes to chose from. Game has english and polish version. Check Google Play for more information and download.

  • Client: Android
  • Date: January 2017
  • Service: Game

Project 2

calmNow app is under development at the moment. The goal of this app is to provide user with positive feedback at anytime necessary. Here are some examples. If you're having a panic attack, open the app and follow instruction to calm yourself. If you're just woke up and don't feel like getting up, open the app and identify yourself with the positive content that's inside. I think that this app will be different than usual how-to-meditate-and-think-positively kind of apps. As always, the app itself will be free.

  • Client: Android
  • Date: Spring 2017
  • Service: Productive/self-development app
